descriptions.description: This reinforcing loop accelerates team growth as more core developers provide mentorship, increasing the promotion rate and further expanding the core team.
This reinforcing loop amplifies project capacity as mentorship builds contributor skills, increasing experienced contributors and the promotion rate, which grows the core team.
This balancing loop stabilizes the contributor pool by limiting the promotion rate, which prevents the depletion of experienced contributors and maintains a sustainable team structure.
This balancing loop regulates the influx of new contributors by creating a skill-up process that controls the rate at which newcomers become integrated into the project.
